## This is my test Quarto file

# Standard Code Block

```{r}
x <- 1
print(x)
log(-x)
```

# Exclude source code

```{r}
#| echo: false
x <- 2
print(x)
log(-x)
```

# Exclude output
```{r}
#| eval: false
x <- 3
print(x)
log(x)
```

# Exclude warnings
```{r}
#| warning: false
x <- 4
print(x)
log(-x)
```

# Suppress everything
```{r}
#| include: false
x <- 5
print(x)
log(-x)
```

# Add figure
```{r}
#| out-width: "90%"
knitr::include_graphics("https://utexas.instructure.com/courses/1438384/files/folder/Course%20Media?preview=89344161")
```
